transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, Gopal ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji sir, ji mai Riya bol rahi hu IndiaMART head office se, kal baat hui thi na aapki.
Executive: Mam maine aapko abhi bataya tha na hum customer team hai, thoda sa baad me baat kar lenge mam.
Customer: Kab call karu sir?
Executive: Abhi kal ke din ek baar aur, kal ke din.
Customer: Sir but ye kab se aapka ye open hai concerned, ye bina aap bata abhi isko close karna hai kya karna hai aap bata dijiye.
Executive: Abhi maine bola na aapko kal baat karte hai uske baare me.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know when the issue will be resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive said they will discuss it tomorrow.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- call, issue, resolution
